definition: pincers/pliers/tongs/claw (of animal)/to grasp with pincers/to pinch/to clamp/to restrain/to restrict/to gag
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: He threw a quick leg kick and clinched his opponent to the corner.
sentences.chinese: 他迅速踢出一腳，將對手鉗住並扭到角落裏。
